data.name: 东方有顶天梦 ~ The Top of The Dream
data.detailed_description:
"The Top of The Dream" is an TouHou style of barrage shooting game produced by the Top of The Legend Studios.

Background of Game Story

The monsters, the inhabitants, all dreamed of a place in the sky, and the immortals noticed the changes in their dreams.
Troubled by the dream of the Reimu, after all alone to explore the sky......

Game mechanics
In a dream, through the power of the dream, fire increases with wakefulness, but also decreases with drowsiness.
When you're fully awake, you fire at full speed.If hit by a barrage, you will consume a lot of wakefulness and save yourself.
Use part of the state value to open the boundary of the dream.At the border.If it is not shot during this time, it returns a portion of its cost and rewards it with a large number of points and eliminates ammo, and if it is hit, it triggers anti-ammo prematurely.

The author's words

The game is more for STG beginners, so if there is enough planning, the resources can be much more.While barrage is more powerful and difficult than most N's and H's, it's enough to break these epic runes if you understand and use the binding mechanism of anti-ammo, anti-ammo, and fire coverage perfectly.Hopefully it will give you some confidence and a sense of accomplishment as you get through very difficult levels and games.
In addition, the difficulty level was not developed due to the size of the game.I'm sorry,

"The Top of The Dream" is an TouHou style of barrage shooting game produced by the Top of The Legend Studios.

Troubled by the dream of the Reimu, after all alone to explore the sky......

Use part of the state value to open the boundary of the dream.At the border.If it is not shot during this time, it returns a portion of its cost and rewards it with a large number of points and eliminates ammo, and if it is hit, it triggers anti-ammo prematurely.

The game is more for STG beginners, so if there is enough planning, the resources can be much more.While barrage is more powerful and difficult than most N's and H's, it's enough to break these epic runes if you understand and use the binding mechanism of anti-ammo, anti-ammo, and fire coverage perfectly.Hopefully it will give you some confidence and a sense of accomplishment as you get through very difficult levels and games.

data.short_description: An TouHou style barrage shooting game, with a unique firepower and boundary mechanism, use of the mechanism and resources, in the difficult Stage and BossBattle to master the rhythm and explore the SpellCard ,to defeat the FinalBoss, uncover the veil of transformation, and see the "dream of the sky"
data.supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WindowsXP
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 8250U
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
